channel.title: PHP语言 on 浩瀚天空
channel.description: Recent content in PHP语言 on 浩瀚天空

item.title: PHP语言的知识点-1
item.description:
下面是将你提供的 Go 语言代码（HTTP 状态码常量和 StatusText 函数）完整转换为 PHP 语言的实现。PHP 中没有原生的 const 块，但我们可以使用 define() 或 class 中的 const 来定义常量，推荐使用类封装的方式更清晰。

✅ PHP 实现：HTTP 状态码常量 + 状态文本函数

  1<?php
  2
  3class HttpStatus
  4{
  5    // 1xx Informational
  6    const StatusContinue                   = 100;
  7    const StatusSwitchingProtocols         = 101;
  8    const StatusProcessing                 = 102;
  9    const StatusEarlyHints                 = 103;
 10
 11    // 2xx Success
 12    const StatusOK                         = 200;
 13    const StatusCreated                    = 201;
 14    const StatusAccepted                   = 202;
 15    const StatusNonAuthoritativeInfo       = 203;
 16    const StatusNoContent                  = 204;
 17    const StatusResetContent               = 205;
 18    const StatusPartialContent             = 206;
 19    const StatusMultiStatus                = 207;
 20    const StatusAlreadyReported            = 208;
 21    const StatusIMUsed                     = 226;
 22
 23    // 3xx Redirection
 24    const StatusMultipleChoices            = 300;
 25    const StatusMovedPermanently           = 301;
 26    const StatusFound                      = 302;
 27    const StatusSeeOther                   = 303;
 28    const StatusNotModified                = 304;
 29    const StatusUseProxy                   = 305;
 30    // 306 is unused, skipped
 31    const StatusTemporaryRedirect          = 307;
 32    const StatusPermanentRedirect          = 308;
 33
 34    // 4xx Client Error
 35    const StatusBadRequest                 = 400;
 36    const StatusUnauthorized               = 401;
 37    const StatusPaymentRequired            = 402;
 38    const StatusForbidden                  = 403;
 39    const StatusNotFound                   = 404;
 40    const StatusMethodNotAllowed           = 405;
 41    const StatusNotAcceptable              = 406;
 42    const StatusProxyAuthRequired          = 407;
 43    const StatusRequestTimeout             = 408;
 44    const StatusConflict                   = 409;
 45    const StatusGone                       = 410;
 46    const StatusLengthRequired             = 411;
 47    const StatusPreconditionFailed         = 412;
 48    const StatusRequestEntityTooLarge      = 413;
 49    const StatusRequestURITooLong          = 414;
 50    const StatusUnsupportedMediaType       = 415;
 51    const StatusRequestedRangeNotSatisfiable = 416;
 52    const StatusExpectationFailed          = 417;
 53    const StatusTeapot                     = 418;
 54    const StatusMisdirectedRequest         = 421;
 55    const StatusUnprocessableEntity        = 422;
 56    const StatusLocked                     = 423;
 57    const StatusFailedDependency           = 424;
 58    const StatusTooEarly                   = 425;
 59    const StatusUpgradeRequired            = 426;
 60    const StatusPreconditionRequired       = 428;
 61    const StatusTooManyRequests            = 429;
 62    const StatusRequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge = 431;
 63    const StatusUnavailableForLegalReasons = 451;
 64
 65    // 5xx Server Error
 66    const StatusInternalServerError        = 500;
 67    const StatusNotImplemented             = 501;
 68    const StatusBadGateway                 = 502;
 69    const StatusServiceUnavailable         = 503;
 70    const StatusGatewayTimeout             = 504;
 71    const StatusHTTPVersionNotSupported    = 505;
 72    const StatusVariantAlsoNegotiates      = 506;
 73    const StatusInsufficientStorage        = 507;
 74    const StatusLoopDetected               = 508;
 75    const StatusNotExtended                = 510;
 76    const StatusNetworkAuthenticationRequired = 511;
 77
 78    /**
 79     * Returns the reason phrase for the given HTTP status code.
 80     *
 81     * @param int $code HTTP status code
 82     * @return string The reason phrase, or empty string if unknown.
 83     */
 84    public static function statusText(int $code): string
 85    {
 86        return match ($code) {
 87            self::StatusContinue => 'Continue',
 88            self::StatusSwitchingProtocols => 'Switching Protocols',
 89            self::StatusProcessing => 'Processing',
 90            self::StatusEarlyHints => 'Early Hints',
 91
 92            self::StatusOK => 'OK',
 93            self::StatusCreated => 'Created',
 94            self::StatusAccepted => 'Accepted',
 95            self::StatusNonAuthoritativeInfo => 'Non-Authoritative Information',
 96            self::StatusNoContent => 'No Content',
 97            self::StatusResetContent => 'Reset Content',
 98            self::StatusPartialContent => 'Partial Content',
 99            self::StatusMultiStatus => 'Multi-Status',
100            self::StatusAlreadyReported => 'Already Reported',
101            self::StatusIMUsed => 'IM Used',
102
103            self::StatusMultipleChoices => 'Multiple Choices',
104            self::StatusMovedPermanently => 'Moved Permanently',
105            self::StatusFound => 'Found',
106            self::StatusSeeOther => 'See Other',
107            self::StatusNotModified => 'Not Modified',
108            self::StatusUseProxy => 'Use Proxy',
109            self::StatusTemporaryRedirect => 'Temporary Redirect',
110            self::StatusPermanentRedirect => 'Permanent Redirect',
111
112            self::StatusBadRequest => 'Bad Request',
113            self::StatusUnauthorized => 'Unauthorized',
114            self::StatusPaymentRequired => 'Payment Required',
115            self::StatusForbidden => 'Forbidden',
116            self::StatusNotFound => 'Not Found',
117            self::StatusMethodNotAllowed => 'Method Not Allowed',
118            self::StatusNotAcceptable => 'Not Acceptable',
119            self::StatusProxyAuthRequired => 'Proxy Authentication Required',
120            self::StatusRequestTimeout => 'Request Timeout',
121            self::StatusConflict => 'Conflict',
122            self::StatusGone => 'Gone',
123            self::StatusLengthRequired => 'Length Required',
124            self::StatusPreconditionFailed => 'Precondition Failed',
125            self::StatusRequestEntityTooLarge => 'Request Entity Too Large',
126            self::StatusRequestURITooLong => 'Request URI Too Long',
127            self::StatusUnsupportedMediaType => 'Unsupported Media Type',
128            self::StatusRequestedRangeNotSatisfiable => 'Requested Range Not Satisfiable',
129            self::StatusExpectationFailed => 'Expectation Failed',
130            self::StatusTeapot => "I'm a teapot",
131            self::StatusMisdirectedRequest => 'Misdirected Request',
132            self::StatusUnprocessableEntity => 'Unprocessable Entity',
133            self::StatusLocked => 'Locked',
134            self::StatusFailedDependency => 'Failed Dependency',
135            self::StatusTooEarly => 'Too Early',
136            self::StatusUpgradeRequired => 'Upgrade Required',
137            self::StatusPreconditionRequired => 'Precondition Required',
138            self::StatusTooManyRequests => 'Too Many Requests',
139            self::StatusRequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge => 'Request Header Fields Too Large',
140            self::StatusUnavailableForLegalReasons => 'Unavailable For Legal Reasons',
141
142            self::StatusInternalServerError => 'Internal Server Error',
143            self::StatusNotImplemented => 'Not Implemented',
144            self::StatusBadGateway => 'Bad Gateway',
145            self::StatusServiceUnavailable => 'Service Unavailable',
146            self::StatusGatewayTimeout => 'Gateway Timeout',
147            self::StatusHTTPVersionNotSupported => 'HTTP Version Not Supported',
148            self::StatusVariantAlsoNegotiates => 'Variant Also Negotiates',
149            self::StatusInsufficientStorage => 'Insufficient Storage',
150            self::StatusLoopDetected => 'Loop Detected',
151            self::StatusNotExtended => 'Not Extended',
152            self::StatusNetworkAuthenticationRequired => 'Network Authentication Required',
153
154            default => ''
155        };
156    }
157}
158
159// --- 使用示例 ---
160// echo HttpStatus::statusText(200); // 输出: OK
161// echo HttpStatus::statusText(404); // 输出: Not Found
162// echo HttpStatus::statusText(999); // 输出: (空字符串)

🔍 说明

  1. PHP 版本要求：
